about_the_game:
Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099 🐒 is coming this year with a lot of amazing content: four new cages, each with a different story and twist, as well as unique puzzles to uncover, such as a Multivision cage featuring two live streams... packed with mysteries to unravel!

To purchase this new DLC, the "Four Cage Gourmet Pack", you'll first need to install the previous free DLC called the "Two Cage Seasoning Pack." Once the first free DLC is installed, you'll now be able to enjoy a total of six fully interactive cages: a plethora of eccentric characters, zany narratives, and cool puzzles!

Additionally, a new menu option will allow you to prioritize the new cages included in both DLCs.

IMPORTANT: If you are a new player, we recommend experiencing the game without prioritizing the new cages at first, as the tutorials are tailored to the specific sequence in which players receive the cages the first time they play Do Not Feed The Monkeys 2099.
detailed_description:
Important note when installing this DLC:

TO PLAY THIS NEW DLC "Four-Cage Gourmet Pack", it's mandatory to FIRST INSTALL THE PREVIOUS FREE DLC called "Two-Cage Seasoning Pack"


About the Game

Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099 🐒 is coming this year with a lot of amazing content: four new cages, each with a different story and twist, as well as unique puzzles to uncover, such as a Multivision cage featuring two live streams... packed with mysteries to unravel!

To purchase this new DLC, the "Four Cage Gourmet Pack", you'll first need to install the previous free DLC called the "Two Cage Seasoning Pack." Once the first free DLC is installed, you'll now be able to enjoy a total of six fully interactive cages: a plethora of eccentric characters, zany narratives, and cool puzzles!

Additionally, a new menu option will allow you to prioritize the new cages included in both DLCs.

IMPORTANT: If you are a new player, we recommend experiencing the game without prioritizing the new cages at first, as the tutorials are tailored to the specific sequence in which players receive the cages the first time they play Do Not Feed The Monkeys 2099.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (32/64) or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 610 (1GB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
  • Additional Notes: Using the Minimum Configuration, we strongly recommend to use minimal settings in order to not experience low frame rates.

Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (32/64), Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 710 (2GB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers

short_description: Welcome to the future of the Primate Observation Club. In this second DLC called "Two Cage Seasoning Pack", spy on strangers through four new security cameras, invade their privacy, and uncover their secrets in this digital voyeur simulator.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, German, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
